column3: ForeScout Technologies -- What we are doing: --  -- Forescout Technologies is the leader in device visibility and control. Our unified security platform enables enterprises and government agencies to gain complete situational awareness of their extended enterprise environments and orchestrate actions to reduce cyber and operational risk. Our technology works with disparate security tools to help accelerate incident response  break down silos  automate workflows and optimize existing investments. We are a company filled with people who are cyber obsessed and passionate about our products. We are all about inclusion and diversity! We work as a team  and everyone matters! Join us as we secure the world with our products. --  -- Forescout’s Centralized Engineering is seeking for an automation developer to be a part of customer oriented testing team   to build simulators  tests and to orchestrate them on hybrid complex tests environments. --  -- What will you do: --  -- Design and develop automation tests to run on hybrid environment (cloud and on-premise) -- Design and develop simulators to be part of the tests environments -- Write automation infrastructure to build complex environments on cloud -- Work with a large product base consisting of multiple product lines with complex interdependencies. -- Collaborate with various Engineering departments and leaders to deliver high-quality products. -- Involved with the customers’ environment and scenarios and replicate them in part of automation suite
column4: Professional Skills: --- ---Must: --- ---4 years of experience as an automation tests developer ---Strong development ability in Python Java and Bash. ---Familiarity with CI/CD methodologies preferably in SaaS environment. ---Good understanding of multiple forms of software testing throughout the entire SDLC : regression functional unit black-box white box UAT usability performance testing etc. ---Ability to work across product organizations on inter-area projects help identify the critical paths of components and resolve dependencies ---Advantages: ---Experience in AWS service offerings and capabilities ---Knowledge of Security/Cloud Technologies ---Experience with complex RCA and defect isolation ---Experience with microservice architectures and dockers ---Experience with building simulators ---Familiarity with Windows environments (Domain controllers and different kind of servers) --- Personal Skills --- ---Ability to easily learn and apply new technologies. ---Ability to dive into unknown code while keeping eyes on the big-picture. ---Work well with others but can work independently as well. ---Strong passion for releasing superb-quality market leading class products. ---Execution driving force able to own a product from A to Z. ---Team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
column8: פיתוח כלי בדיקות  JAVA  מתכנת

column3: reblaze -- Reblaze Technologies is a fast-moving company creating and providing the next generation of web security technologies and delivering them to our expanding global customers’ base. We’re at the forefront of multiple security trends  uniquely combining cloud computing  Big Data  Machine Learning  and other cutting-edge fields into an intelligent  dynamic  and robust cybersecurity SaaS platform running on public clouds or private clouds of the customer’s choice. -- We are looking for an experienced hands-on software QA Manager / Team Lead to join our R&D team. The ideal candidate will need a combination of technical and leadership skills  and passion to build a strong QA team and supporting processes. This role will provide exceptional career growth opportunities as you develop and acquire new security skills in the course of your duties  and help Reblaze to build scalable software development and release processes. --  -- Primary Responsibilities --  -- Be hands-on type of manager. -- Hire  manage and develop QA Engineers. -- Establish and drive new QA processes and procedures. -- Define and implement an effective test strategy  both manual and automated. -- Drive design and implementation of automation infrastructure and tests for full system coverage. -- Troubleshoot complex product issues  actively assisting developers to analyze and resolve bugs. -- Participate in the technical design  development  and testing of new features and products. -- Reflect product maturity status to management based on well defined KPI’s. -- Own and improve Reblaze software release management process. -- Always ask "why" and strive to do better!
column4: BSc in Computer Science or equivalent. ---A team player that can thrive in a very dynamic environment. ---5+ years of experience with SaaS products 2+ years in management role. ---2+ years of experience in QA automation including infrastructure development. ---Good understanding of web application architecture and cloud infrastructure. ---Understands web applications security challenges and vulnerabilities. ---Scripting and programming experience (Shell Python JavaScript). ---Extensive experience working in Linux environment. ---Experience with Test Management Systems. ---Excellent English and communication skills.
